description.en:
A story about the heroine of the story, Li, who suddenly becomes popular, and the quadruplet brothers who are pursuing her at the same time.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=2679902), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list.nhn?titleId=693429)

description.id:
Empat cowok kembar menyukaiku! Apa ini keberuntungan?!

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=2679902), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list.nhn?titleId=693429)

description.ko:
어쩐지 인기가 절정인 여주인공 여주.  
그녀에게 한꺼번에 구애하는 쌍둥이 네형제.

---

description.ru:
Четверо братьев, разных, как кетчуп и майонез. Это судьба или везение?

description.zh:
平凡少女一夜之间变得受欢迎，
被四胞胎同时追求是什么体验？
她又会作何选择呢？

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=2679902), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list.nhn?titleId=693429)
